summary: A player home in an enchanted crystal cave with all the necessities. Portal is located in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
A player home with all the necessities:
Alchemy Table
Enchanting Table
Cooking Range
Forge, workbench, grindstone
Bookcase
2 Mannequins
Weapon racks
Shrine to Dibella
Woodcutting block
A free goat
Plenty of storage

Portal is located in Riverwood. You will need to go through Crystal Reach Grove to get to the hideout. There is a teleport spell on the table by the tent in the grove. You can use that to quick travel to the hideout.


http://youtu.be/Ju2--EuiFbM - Video of the mod (not sure how to embed videos here so here\'s the link.)
Video by Memorablelol
author: SqueakyDoggy
